Text: Re Green Power ConferenceWell I know you are interested in greenrenewable energy programs and issues because you were at the conference in Portland So am I It seems that renewable energy is on the brink of reaching a tipping point or critical mass in its move into the mass culture and utility strategic planning That is exciting and gratifying for the many people who have been working hard to make this happen Although acquiring and increasing your supply of renewable power is still a challenge the bigger more pressing challenge in our estimation is selling it how who where when and for how much So how far along are you in getting your customers to think about and buy green power Need some help We at Energy Market Solutions have been asking residential and business customers of utilities about green renewable and environmental issues for almost years We can help you understand the dynamics of the customer perspective on these issues including positioning and pricing a green program for success communicating effective green messages and the effects of green programs on your image and brand Call or email me to discuss how we can work with you on this exciting journey Nikki Smathers Energy Market Solutions PS If you would like to know more about us check out our web site wwwEnergyMarketSolutionscom
